page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content:
Life at home begins when my mum gets up at 6.45am.My dad then gets up at 7.00am.I get up at 7.10am every morning.My dad is an Engineer on the farm which we live near.I get dressed for school after my dad has gone to work.Then my mum gets breakfast .My brother Jeffrey gets up at 7.30. He y has to travel to work on his bicycle.
.Me and my sister go for the school bus at 8.15am.My dad goes home for his breakfast at 8.25.My brother takes his breakfast in the morning with him. After that my mum cleans up and makes the beds.Louise my sister helps my mum clean up too.When I go home at 3.00pm I watch SONS AND DAUGHTERS or a COUNTRY PRACTICE.Angela my sister gets home at 4.15pm.At 4.45pm my mum makes our teas.My dad gets home at 5.00pm. Jeffrey gets home at 5.15pm.
